divs: Sighting Detailswhile looking up in the sky on the night of June 16th 2012 at aproximatly 10:30pm I saw a star that began to glow in a very bright orange color and grew in diameter for a few seconds, then it returned to its original glow and size (starlike) and started racing across the sky towards the west very fast, to fast to be a high altitude plane or even a satelite. A few seconds later another starlike light was observed speeding in the same trajectory and moving at the same speed or even faster,all this occured in a 20 second timeframe.
Summary: starlike light started to glow in a bright orange and came back to original brightness and left westward very fast
trends: There has been one other sighting in Quebec
There were no other sightings in Quebec on or around June 16th 2012
